Types of anaemia:
1. Nutritional Anemia: It is caused due to deficiency of micro-nutrient such as minerals (iron, zinc, copper, 
selenium etc.) and vitamins (Folic acid, Vit. B12, Vit. B6)
2. Non-nutritional Anemia: Due to haemoglobinopathies (thalassemia and sickle cell anemia), Soil 
Transmitted helminths inflammation, fluorosis and malaria and chronic diseases such as tuberculosis etc.
